notes.observation: Maintenance tickets from the same hour exist, but CCTV shows him in Treasury hall
Forensic timestamps on the USB logs are newer than the actual transfer.
CCTV feed shows him in the lobby. Badge system indicates Treasury access.
At 12:13 AM, CFO terminal requested OTP. Same second, Treasury system used OTP from ‘unknown device’.
Email sent from Rizvi's computer.Spotify shows she was streaming music.
12:15 AM corrupted commit tagged to Abbilash.

hints.pattern: When evidence contradicts itself, one of the records has been tampered with.
hints.reminder: Cross-check logs across different files. Single-source truths are unreliable.

notes.observation: OTP request and badge entry overlap within the same second.
Lobby and Treasury feeds show hash mismatches.
Mount event recorded at /mnt/cakebox around 12:15 AM.
Email confirmation logged at 12:20 AM from internal server address.
Commit recorded at 12:15 AM during Treasury activity window.
